segments.text: We are redecorating and I'm going to add some things .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'll be glad to help you out . We can deliver what you need to your office .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Shall we meet at 1:15 this Thursday ? We definitely need some new filing cabinets and at least one desk unit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine , I'll bring both our office furniture and equipment catalogs on Thursday .
segments.speaker: S2
